query: Could you formulate a 7-day travel plan for a group of 7 departing from Raleigh to New York, where we would be exploring 3 cities between March 13th and March 19th, 2022? Our budget is set at $31,600 for this trip. Please note the necessity for accommodations that allow children under the age of 10.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Syracuse,Binghamton,Buffalo]
